author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA CONTINUES TO DRIFT NORTH-NORTHWEST... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FOR SOUTHWEST COAST OF HAITI, WITH HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING EXPECTED FOR HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...MELISSA CONTINUES TO DRIFT NORTH-NORTHWEST... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FOR SOUTHWEST COAST OF HAITI, WITH HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING EXPECTED FOR HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 2:00 PM EDT Thu Oct 23 the center of Melissa was located near 15.5, -75.3 with movement NNW at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA CONTINUES TO DRIFT NORTH-NORTHWEST... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FOR SOUTHWEST COAST OF HAITI, WITH HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING EXPECTED FOR HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 2:00 PM EDT Thu Oct 23 the center of Melissa was located near 15.5, -75.3 with movement NNW at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
